author: sessionizill
title: Decentralized Music Platform LatAm
description: Latin American artists only access to a global music marketplace is streaming giants like Spotify.  They need more favorable options.
solution: We'll build a Direct2consumer music streaming player for record labels. This proposal will focus specifically on onboarding LatAm artists.
experience: Over 20 years in the music business. My friend has years in the biz specifically in LatAm,  managing a huge LatAm artist, Anuel AA.
